itemLabel: Robert Hutchison, 1st Baron Hutchison of Montrose

wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Robert Hutchison, 1st Baron Hutchison of Montrose,  (5 September 1873 – 13 June 1950), was a Scottish soldier and Liberal politician.

response: *Robert Hutchison, 1st Baron Hutchison of Montrose (1873–1950), British Major General in World War I
